Sentencas: The development of symmetrical solid oxide fuel cells (SSOFCs) can accelerate the commercialization of SOFCs because it can reduce the fabrication cost, improve the thermomechanical compatibility between the electrolyte and electrodes, and enhance the ability of resisting coking and sulfur poisoning.
Titulo: In-situ growth of nanoparticles-decorated double perovskite electrode materials for symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: In addition, it is more convenient to switch between the SOFC mode and the solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) mode for the SSOFCs.
Titulo: In-situ growth of nanoparticles-decorated double perovskite electrode materials for symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: In this work, we report a new family of double perovskite symmetrical electrodes Sr2Ti1-xCoxFeO6 (x = 0, 0.1, 0.2, 0.3, STCF) for SSOFCs.
Titulo: In-situ growth of nanoparticles-decorated double perovskite electrode materials for symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The Sr2Ti0.8Co0.2FeO6 (STC02 F) electrode can be exsoluted with the cobalt-iron alloy nanoparticles and can maintain the double perovskite structure in reducing atmosphere.
Titulo: In-situ growth of nanoparticles-decorated double perovskite electrode materials for symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The STC02 F electrode also has good chemical compatibility with La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3 (LSGM) electrolyte.
Titulo: In-situ growth of nanoparticles-decorated double perovskite electrode materials for symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The polarization resistance (R-p) values of the STC02F-based symmetrical cells are 0.124 and 0.380 Omega cm(2) at 800 degrees C in air and in hydrogen, respectively.
Titulo: In-situ growth of nanoparticles-decorated double perovskite electrode materials for symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: The output power densities of the single cell with the configuration STC02 F/LSGM (270 mu m)/STC02 F reach 555, 180, 404, and 390mW cm(-2) at 800 degrees C using H-2, liquefied petroleum gas, C2H5OH, and CH3OH, respectively.
Titulo: In-situ growth of nanoparticles-decorated double perovskite electrode materials for symmetrical solid oxide cells

Sentencas: Moreover, the symmetrical cell with STC02 F electrode shows good electrochemical performance and stability for the electrolysis of H2O or CO2 and co-electrolysis of H2O/CO2 at intermediate temperatures for SOECs.
Titulo: In-situ growth of nanoparticles-decorated double perovskite electrode materials for symmetrical solid oxide cells
